bio:
Travel & Architectural Photographer from Milan, Italy 🇮🇹
Traveling the world to capture its beauty🗺️
✨ @siruiimaging Ambassador
.
⬇️ Website ⬇️

posts.caption:
Last rays of sun in Los Angeles 🇺🇲✨ [read below for the full story behind the shot]
__________________________________________
I planned shooting this classical view of the City of Angels since quite some time. Unfortunately, when I arrived at the location I found out that the viewpoint would have closed before sunset. 😯
As I am a "blue hour" kind of guy, I was pretty upset about this, as well as the guys next to me. In fact, just beside me, there was a @bbc crew which was there filming some B-roll for a documentary.🎥
We didn't capture the blue hour, but we somehow managed to stay well over the closing time and get the last rays of the sun, which as you can see from the picture create a beautiful effect.
All this was possible thanks to a super cool LAPD officer, which was there on duty and allowed us to stay 40-min longer. 🙏
His act of kindness & understanding allowed the crew to get their job done, and me to shoot at a time of day where I normally don't, letting me go out of my "photography comfort zone".
Thank you buddy 🤜🏻✨🤛🏿
#smallthings

Sunrise in Cappadocia, Turkey 🇹🇷
I took this picture while flying on a hot air balloon (what an experience 😍); the scenery was so peaceful, and it made me remember that every morning it's like we are born again.
Our day is like a blank canvas, and we are the only ones who can decide what to paint on it.
Don't postpone doing things that you love, don't leave things unsaid: make your painting beautiful, everyday. ✨
__________________________________________
New YouTube video for behind the scenes and more 🙂 link in bio 🔥

Whatever good things we build, they end up building us✨ 
I would move to #Singapore just for being able to look at this scenery every day. 🇸🇬
In the meantime, I'll just print a huge canvas of this photograph to hang it in my studio, so that I can already look at this scenery every day 🌃😍

Swim in a heated pool, relax in a cozy villa, or swim in the cold sea? 😍
Shot for #ClubMed with #DJI #MavicAir.
[Read below the full story behind the shot].
__________________________________________
If you want to know my answer to the above question, I haven't done any of those activities as I was just too busy shooting this stunning property, @ClubMedCefalu by @ClubMed 😁
.
That's ok though, as there's nothing better than doing what you love. That puts you in a state defined as "flow": you just live in the present moment, focusing all of yourself in what you are doing. ✨
That definitely happens everytime I'm behind the camera or when flying @djiglobal drones.
.
I wish everyone to find "their thing" and go for it, as there's no better feeling 🙏

Have you ever seen Llamas? 😍
This is a magical moment captured during my trip in #Peru.
➡️ Link in bio to see how this happened 🎥

location.location_name: Sacred Valley of the Incas, Peru

posts.caption:
Sicilian Summer in November 🌅
Shot while flying from #ClubMed with #DJI #MavicAir 👇[Read below the full story behind this shot]👇
__________________________________________
Just as I've started the caption of my previous post, I can't believe it took me this long for traveling to one of the most beautiful regions in the world, Sicily, which is just a 1-hour flight from where I live 🇮🇹
.
It has been an intense 10-day trip, shooting a truly stunning property by @ClubMed: @ClubMedCefalu.
Being built on rugged cliffs with a breathtaking view over Cefalù Bay, I focused on shooting aerials images of the property (see more of it in the upcoming posts) with @djiglobal drones. 🚁
The view of Cefalù you see from this photograph is the one you get from the resort, a view that left me in awe every morning, every afternoon, and every evening. 🤩
.
It's hard to define with words what Sicily is, so I'll leave you with a quote by the great J. W. von Goethe: "Italy without Sicily leaves no image on the soul; here is the key to all." ✨

Do you see those tiny grains of sand?
That's what we are compared to the Universe.✨
Still, it's unbelievably beautiful to think that every grain of Sand is aiming to the Stars🌌
============================
The most perfect way to end our week in Peru 🇵🇪
.
Thank you for this once in a lifetime experience🙏
#destinationdiscoveries
@theluxurycollection
@beautifuldestinations
@hotelparacas

It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
The whole world will never forget what happened 17 years ago, as we will never lose the hope for building a peaceful world. 🙏
#neverforget

Location scouting at the @stregissg 🤩
I've spent the past weekend at this incredible property in the heart of one of my absolutely favorite cities in the world: Singapore 🇸🇬✨
What made my stay even more special was having a delicious and authentic Italian dinner at "La Brezza" signature restaurant. 😍
The perfectly balanced dishes created by the chef Mr. Armando definitely made me feel like at home 🇮🇹
@stregishotels #stregis #stregissg #liveexquisite
__________________________________________
➡️If you could choose any cities where to spend the upcoming weekend, where would you go to? ✈️

Venice Beach, Los Angeles 🇺🇲
__________________________________________
Have you ever felt like being at home even if you were on the other side of the world?🌎↔️🌍
This is exactly what happened to me last week during my time in #LA!
It just has it all: warm weather, ocean, palm trees, and dreamers ✨

What's a place you'd like to call home?

One of my favorite things about #Bali is that there's a place for everyone, thanks to its incredible variety of landscapes: busy beaches, solitary volcanoes, relaxing rice fields, you name it. 🌊🌋🌾
And then...there's the #Jungle, a constant reminder of nature's power.
Definitely the perfect location for @chapungsebali, which gently sits on this lush wilderness.

Can you imagine sitting in the middle of the rice fields, having dinner with your other half at a private table surrounded by candles and fireflies? 😍
We had our anniversary just a few days ago, and this was the absolute perfect way to end the celebrations 👩‍❤‍👨
Thanks to @thechediclubtanahgajah for this incredible experience ✨
.
#gmhotels #lwtravelers #thechediclubtanahgajah #sunset #balisunset #romanticdinner #anniversary #ricefields #bali #ubud #indonesia #beautifulhotels #travelphotography #tlpicks #puddles #colorblast #a7rii #alphacollective

location.location_name: The Chedi Club Tanah Gajah, Ubud, Bali - a GHM hotel

posts.caption:
Would you wake up to shoot the sunrise or would you rather indulge in your super-comfy bed in one of those villas? 🏃😪
I faced this very same doubt while staying there at @thechediclubtanahgajah, but no matter how tired I was, there's simply no better feeling than start living a new day together with the sun☀🌴
.
#gmhotels #thechediclubtanahgajah #aerial #iamdji #lwtravelers #bali #ubud #indonesia #beautifulhotels #drone #travelphotography #tlpicks

posts.caption:
Can you believe salt can be created from the mountains?! 😯
These are the "Salinas de Maras" in Peru! 😍🇵🇪
.

Interior goals at @stregissg 🤩
Definitely the perfect place where to spend Mondays (and every other day of the week) at 🇸🇬✨
__________________________________________
➡️Where would you like spending Mondays at?
#stregissg #stregis #liveexquisite

Peaceful sunset in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia 🇲🇾✨
The last 2 weeks in KL really flew; this has been my 3rd time in the city, and I'm sure I'll be back again.
It doesn't have that much to offer for my kind of photography, but there's something I really like about it: it constantly evolves, aiming higher and higher.
__________________________________________
Highlights of my stay:
1) I witnessed the election days, where the opposition (finally) won after 60 years. The population was really happy about it and are looking forward to what's next 💪
2) I watched "@avengers Infinity War" (who else did? 😭) in a huge cinema with moving seats, something that we don't have in Italy.
3) I trained in a running track with locals of every age, from children to elders. It's amazing to see how sport brings everyone together🚸

This full-time traveler thing is making me experience so many little things, that together are creating a beautiful book of memories within myself.
Let's be grateful for the #littlethings of life ✨

Light trails at the iconic "Venice Sign" in Los Angeles 🇺🇲✨
⬇️[read below the full story behind the shot]⬇️
__________________________________________
As a professional photographer I normally shoot with big cameras, but as a technology lover I sometimes wonder if it would be possible to shoot a light trail picture with a phone.🤔
Just a day before leaving for my trip to LA, @huaweimobileit sent over their #huaweip20pro to let me test the capabilities of its camera.
I also happen to love challenges, so the game was on.💪
I had just spent the evening around Abbot Kinney Boulevard with the one and only @lantonova 🍸, and now it was time to get to work.
I positioned my tripod just below the sidewalk, and I started shooting with the phone, using its manual mode and RAW files (40 megapixels each😱).
I didn't know what to expect, as it was the first time I was using the camera of the phone in such conditions.
So once at home I imported the picture on my computer, and I was blown away (or should I say Huawei). 🤩
#takenwithHuawei

Of all the cities I've been to, #Singapore is my absolute favorite one ✨
There are so many reasons for which I'd move there, so here are my top ones:
🌆 Incredible Cityscapes
😎 Futuristic & Modern
⛑️ Safe & Clean
🕌 Multicultural 🍛 Great food culture
🌏 Close to other incredibly beautiful places
🏃‍♂️ Great running tracks
__________________________________________
Have you ever been there? Would you move there? ✨

This day, 2 months ago, I left Italy with a one-way flight to South East Asia🌏, officially turning "full-time traveler" 👦.
It seemed scary at first, but after a few weeks of adjustments, I've started to experience a level of freedom that I never thought possible 🕊.
All I have with me is a suitcase 💼 and a photography trolley 📷, but that's all I need to be happy and pursue my ultimate goal: traveling the world to capture its beauty ✨

Paradise found just behind my room at @museumhotel 😍✨
No wonder this lovely garden is called Eden 🕊️

New York City has always been the destination that I wanted to visit the most. 🇺🇲
I could feel its energy all the way from Italy, and I so wanted to go there and photograph its unique cityscapes.🌇
.
2017 is the year when I made my dream reality.✨ What made my trip even more special was spending my very 1st night in Manhattan at the @ritzcarlton #batterypark, as it really seemed like a movie: I arrived late at night, entered my room and there it was. Just outside the window, the Statue of Liberty.🗽
.
I spent the next day relaxing, but I couldn't miss the chance of shooting my first NYC sunset! So I took a fast ferry ride, reached Jersey City and set my camera.📷
.
Manhattan did the rest ♥️
.
#RCMemories #RCPartner

A grain of rice is something so simple 🌾, so tiny that it passes unnoticed in our busy lives.
Still, it takes 6 months to develop and requires a lot of daily care (and water) by the farmers.
How many things do we give for granted in our lives, not knowing how much work and love there's behind them? 🙈
Traveling can really teach us a lot, not just about different cultures, but about Life.
@thechediclubtanahgajah (a @ghmhotels) welcomed me and @absofashionlutely_ for some of our first days as full-time travelers, making us explore their infinite rice fields just behind the property.
Upon checkout we were gifted with a bag of rice, produced by those very same fields & farmers.😯
This evening we had dinner with it, and I can tell you it tasted very special, as the special ingredient was Gratitude ✨
.
#gmhotels #thechediclubtanahgajah #lwtravelers #bali #ubud #indonesia #streetphotography #travelphotography #tlpicks #ricefields #littlethings #sonyalpha

posts.caption:
Hands down one of the most beautiful place I've ever seen. 😍
The Power and Magic you feel while standing in front of Machu Picchu will simply leave you speechless. ⛰️
Have you ever been there?
.
➡️ LINK IN BIO for the full story of that day with @beautifuldestinations & @theluxurycollection 🔥

Today it's a very special day: I'm launching my YouTube Channel!✨✨✨
.
I've created a WEEKLY SERIES which will take you around the world with me, showing you the Travel Photography Life. 🌎📷🌍
.
This is something I've been working on for the last few months: it'd mean a lot to me if you could check out my 1st video and leave a comment on it! 🙂🙏 .
✨ LINK IN BIO ✨
.
Oh, and happy birthday to me🎉

I always believed that some places only existed in fairy tales; then I visited Cappadocia 🇹🇷
This is the incredible scene you get when staying at @museumhotel 😍✨ .
P.S. yes, the pool is heated so you can have your Roman bath even during winter 🙃

Kuala Lumpur 🇲🇾✨
Can you believe this was the view from our apartment? 😮
__________________________________________
I'm back to Europe for the whole month of April, and I'm currently exploring Turkey 🇹🇷 check out my stories to see what happened during the last few days!
Spoiler alert: I flew on a helicopter, met @nusr_et, saw the biggest tulip "carpet" in the world and had breakfast with Istanbul mayor 😮 The most epic week!! 🔥All possible thanks to the amazing organization of @inflowsummits 🙏

I always aim to travel as far as possible to find wonderful locations, but sometimes we forget that Beauty can be found just around the corner.🔎👀
This lovely city is called Verona, and it's known for being the city of the most famous lovers: Romeo & Juliet 💏🇮🇹
And well, it happens to be less than a 2h drive from my city 🙂
.
➡️ Link in bio for the video!
.
This was the last shot I've taken in 2017, while tomorrow I'm going to share my first shot of 2018, a new video and some exciting news 🤩

Peaceful morning in Istanbul, the only place where you can find a mosque with a unique shape, next to an ultramodern bridge 🇹🇷🌉 Check my previous post for an epic view of that bridge 😊
.
P.S. That was also the view we had from the restaurant for the farewell dinner with all the old and new friends from @inflowsummits 😍

This is what happens when Design & Architecture meet the Jungle. 🌴✨
I couldn't get enough of my villa at @chapungsebali 😍

Istanbul never ceases to amaze me 🇹🇷
This was my 3rd time visiting the city, and I still could find new areas to explore and photograph 😮
Not every city has so much to offer, so if you crave for experiencing a unique mix of cultures, food and landscapes, #Istanbul is for you😍
Gratitude to @inflowsummits for taking me there all the way from South East Asia🙏 and for all the amazing experiences (check my previous post for more) ✨

Long exposure in Prague! 🇨🇿
If you're planning a trip to Europe, definitely add this city to your list: great cityscapes & beer 🍻
__________________________________________
💣NEW VIDEO! Link in Bio to see all the "behind the scenes" 🙂 Let me know what you think!🙏

One of the most memorable mornings of my whole life was when I woke up at 4.30am, hopped on an hot air balloon 🎈and enjoed the incredible scenery of Cappadocia from above. 😍🇹🇷
Gratitude to my friends at @butterflyballoons for this unforgettable experience! ✨

I could spend countless hours admiring this incredible creation of Nature 😍🌅
============================
💡Want to see more?
➡️VIDEO (link in bio) to discover the story behind this picture

Hallstatt beauty 🇦🇹
2018 couldn't have had a better start, as I've spent the 1st day of the year photographing this surreal village 😍 .
➡️🔥Check out the NEW VIDEO in bio to see how I've shot this 😊
.
✨Oh and HAPPY NEW YEAR! ✨
What's the big goal you want to realize this year?
Mine will happen in the next few months: I'll say bye-bye to my beloved Italy for quite some time, and move to Asia 🇮🇹🔜🌏🤩
Don't postpone doing what you love: there's no better time than now 🙂

Peaceful summer day in Prague 🇨🇿✨
.
You can get this lovely view of Charles Bridge and the Old Town Bridge Tower with just a 5min from the @augustineprague, a stunning property from @theluxurycollection built in an ancient monastery! 😍

Amusement Park on the Santa Monica Pier 🇺🇲✨
[read below the full story behind this shot]
_____________________________________
My stay in LA was pretty short, and I could just 3 sunsets. The Santa Monica Pier is such an iconic location that definitely deserved its own shooting🎢
.
I arrived, positioned my tripod between the sand and the water, and waited.
As soon as the sun went down, the sky got illuminated by this gorgeous warm light, a gentle breeze was touching the sea; everything was perfect.🤩
.
So perfect that a young couple went with their feet inside the water, and started to hug during the best moment, just in the middle of my frame 😅
I wanted to go there and kindly ask them to move just a bit (I don't think they had noticed me), but I decided that their special moment was more important than my picture.
.
That was a REALLY long hug, something like 10-15min, and when they went away the sky wasn't that nice anymore.
Gladly, with some Photoshop magic, I was able to "kindly remove them" from my shot.
At the end of the day, we all got what we wanted: I got my shot, and they got their beautiful memory 🙂

We can choose to be free 🕊️
⤵️
In 15 days I'll hop on a one-way flight, leaving everything behind (except for my gear📷 and some clothes 💼) to start traveling full-time.
1st month in Bali🇮🇩, 2nd month in Malaysia🇲🇾, where to next? We still don't know 🤓
Yes it's risky, unknown, scary and blablabla, BUT I've never felt more alive than now as there's nothing better than following your biggest dream ✨
P.S. I know I've been neglecting Instagram, but I was (still am) trying to pack my life in a suitcase 🙃
__________________________________________
#travelphotography #fulltimetravel #digitalnomad #lifegoals #austria #photography #landscape
